document.docAuthor: Peck, Stewart B. & Newton, Alfred F.
document.masterDocTitle: An Annotated Catalog of the Leiodidae (Coleoptera) of the Nearctic Region (Continental North America North of Mexico)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An Annotated Catalog of the Leiodidae (Coleoptera) of the Nearctic Region (Continental North America North of Mexico)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Appadelopsis Gnaspini, 1996: 538
(as subgenus of
Ptomaphagus
). Type species:
Adelops mitchellensis Hatch, 1933
(by original designation). Biology: Small-eyed, flightless soil-litter inhabitants (edaphobites).

P. ( A. ) alleghenyensis
(
Peck, 1978b: 363 )
(
Adelopsis
). Holotype male in CNCI. Type locality:
5 mi S Witmer
, Pendleton County , West Virginia . North American distribution:
USA :
WV.

AL, GA.
